block.capabilityproxy.capability_proxy.i: 連結目標方塊時可代理其方塊的功能。目標方塊必須直接連結。
block.capabilityproxy.entity_capability_: 連結目標實體時可代理其實體的功能。目標實體必須位於鄰近位置。
block.capabilityproxy.item_capability_pr: Expose the capabilities from the stored item via this block. The target side is only accessible for piping in/out the contained item.
block.capabilityproxy.ranged_capability_: Access the target block capabilities from this block. The target block is the closest applicable block within 16 blocks.
